channel.title: About on ANTONIO VAZQUEZ BRUST
channel.description: Recent content in About on ANTONIO VAZQUEZ BRUST

item.description: Iâ€™m Tony, an Urban Data Science consultant & researcher. I specialize in the application of novel analytical tools and emerging technologies to better understand and manage our cities. I hold a Bachelor’s in Computer Science, a Graduate Degree in Urban and Regional Planning, and a Master’s in Urban Informatics. I have had the opportunity to teach postgraduate courses focused on data analysis and visualization at various institutions including the University of Buenos Aires, Torcuato di Tella University, UNSAM, and FLACSO.
** index doesn’t contain a body, just front matter above. See about/list.html in the layouts folder **
